undergraduate.gpa_requirement: Competitive applicants typically have GPAs above 3.8 weighted
undergraduate.sat_range: Test-optional; scores typically 1350-1530 for submitted SAT
undergraduate.act_range: Test-optional; scores typically 30-34 for submitted ACT
undergraduate.essays_required: Yes, two supplemental essays: leadership/citizenship and program-specific
undergraduate.supplemental_materials: Optional for some programs (e.g., arts portfolios)

costs.financial_aid_available: Yes, need-based aid available including scholarships and grants

required_courses: 3 years of Science (including 1 year of lab science)
recommended_courses: Extra electives in AP/IB or honors courses
admission_requirements.extracurricular_importance: Highly important; leadership, service, and achievements strongly valued

student_life.dining_options: Multiple dining halls, cafes, and food courts with diverse offerings
student_life.study_abroad_programs: Extensive study abroad programs with global partner universities

special_features: New Early Decision option starting 2025-2026 cycle
Integrated Business and Engineering dual degree program
Strong emphasis on leadership and community engagement
Large public research university with strong alumni network
